item.text: A "chose in action" is essentially a right to sue. It is an intangible personal property right recognized and protected by the law, that has no existence apart from the recognition given by the law, and that confers no present possession of a tangible object. Another term is a [[Thing in Action]] - [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chose Wikipedia].

story.text: A "chose in action" is essentially a right to sue. It is an intangible personal property right recognized and protected by the law, that has no existence apart from the recognition given by the law, and that confers no present possession of a tangible object. Another term is a [[Thing in Action]] - [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chose Wikipedia].
